column4: Need some help installing an app off an external hdd using the commands on the following site http://wireless.kernel.org/en/users/Download#DownloadlatestLinuxwirelessdrivers Not quite sure how to do it via terminal if anyone could help via pm please.
I sent you the link to read how to compile a program from a tar ball, not to criticize :)
if you type somebodie's nick, the line will be highlighted for him/her (in my case type gun<tab>), did you install build-essential?
